nodes.text: Murro was a fathier who served as part of the entertainment at the Grakkus Arena. According to a preliminary advertisement for Vontor's eve engagements at the Grakkus Arena presented to Grakkus the Hutt by Toren, Murro performed the margengai glide poorly.
Murro was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide by Daniel Wallace.
